title: Looking for a new Fashion Editorial Display font
author: Btype

comments.content:
Those are nice.

Also check out: [http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/ "http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/")

hhp

Anything in particular?

Here's a few from Font Bureau.

Miller Banner: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/MillerBanner](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/MillerBanner "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/MillerBanner")  
Old Modern: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/OldModern](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/OldModern "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/OldModern")  
Stilson: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stilson](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stilson "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stilson")  
Benton Modern Display: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonModernDisplay](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonModernDisplay "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonModernDisplay")

Some of my favourites.

Acta Display: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/")  
Monotype Modern: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/")  
Austin: [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin")  
Platform: [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/platform](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/platform "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/platform")

Some of my favourites.

Acta Display: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/")  
Monotype Modern: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/monotype-modern/")  
Austin: [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020514/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin")
